resources.string: You have network problems.\nCheck your internet connection.\nOr use a proxy server.
Enter your search terms to find your site in the search engine you selected.

Attention: Frequent spam-requests  it is recommended to use a proxy client to avoid time penalties from the search engine as entering captcha.

If any error occurs while the application is running on your device, please let us know. Also, leave your wishes, we will review them.\nIf you write from another device, please specify the model and version of the device android where errors occur.

An application designed to search for a site for a particular query positions in real time. You can follow any responses to search for the most popular search engines (currently 6 searchers from different regions).
Particular application:
- Search the site positions is carried out in real time. While webmaster tools are delayed (usually 2-3 days).
- Get external links, Google PR, Yandex TCI, indexed pages.

Intuitive interface:
1.Enter the url 
2.Press "Request"(min 4 symbols) 
3.Press on the "Start" 

 In the future it will be realized:
 - Support of available regions for search systems
 - Automatic verification
 - Adding the search systems

The full version of the application, removes limitations.
Features:
- No timer
- Step Selection (11 to 250). Except Yahoo (its limit of 150)
- No advertising
Buying occurred. Please restart the application
